member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources.Errors_DetailsFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, default is {0}. Specifies that detailed error information should be displayed for the following errors: {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources.Statistics_CosmosTableLogConnectionString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, Connection string for cosmos tables for logging. If provided, it will use this endpoint info for remotely logging failure info..

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources.Statistics_EnableCosmosTableLog
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, Enables logging to a remote Cosmos DB Table API account. Unless destination is cosmos tables api, this also needs 'CosmosTableLogConnectionString' property..

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources.Statistics_ErrorLog
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. Name of the CSV file to redirect data transfer failures.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources.Statistics_OverwriteErrorLog
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. Overwrite error log file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ServiceModel.ConfigurationResources.Statistics_ProgressUpdateIntervalFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, default is {0}. Time interval to refresh on-screen data transfer progress.
